mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (tea_id, title, content, class_id, state) VALUES (#{teaId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{classId}, #{state})
mapper.select: SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, tea_id AS teaId, class_id AS classId, title, content, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, state FROM notice WHERE class_id=#{classId} AND state=#{state}

SELECT DISTINCT a.notice_id AS noticeId, a.tea_id AS teaId, a.class_id AS classId, a.title, a.content, a.created_at AS createdAt, a.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM notice a JOIN student_classes b ON a.class_id = b.class_id JOIN student c ON b.stu_id = c.stu_id JOIN parents d ON c.parents_id = d.parents_id WHERE a.class_id=#{classId} AND a.state=#{state};
SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, tea_id AS teaId, class_id AS classId, title, content, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, state FROM notice
